author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...GILMA CONTINUES TO BATTLE STRONG WIND SHEAR...
summary:
...GILMA CONTINUES TO BATTLE STRONG WIND SHEAR...
 As of 2:00 AM PDT Tue Aug 20
 the center of Gilma was located near 15.7, -118.3
 with movement WNW at 8 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1000 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.
